news.title: Bitcoin futures data shows bears gearing up for an assault on $60K
news.titleOriginal: Bitcoin futures data shows bears gearing up for an assault on $60K
news.summary: Bitcoin’s rejection at $70,000 and the large liquidity void below leave $60,000 vulnerable, a move analysts see as likely in the coming days.

news.title: Deel taps MoonPay to roll out stablecoin salary payouts in UK, EU
news.titleOriginal: Deel taps MoonPay to roll out stablecoin salary payouts in UK, EU
